body:
`module find --shell` is broken if `--prefix` is not specified (note the `None`):

```
# bison@3.0.4%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux-fedora24-x86_64
module load Nonebison-3.0.4-gcc-6.1.1-g7wd2yi7sbkbgxnxx6ybe7bgcb6g5lwl
```

My patch fixes this problem:

```
# bison@3.0.4%gcc@6.1.1 arch=linux-fedora24-x86_64
module load bison-3.0.4-gcc-6.1.1-g7wd2yi7sbkbgxnxx6ybe7bgcb6g5lwl
```
title: Fix module find --shell without --prefix.
